creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: 2 panels with 3 sets of stripes each; first set: tan with red, pale green and dark blue; set 2: red and blue with tan; set 3: pale green, red and blue with single peach stripe; panels joined at center with tan and hot pink yarn
title: Perraje (wrap)
